definitions.body: trembling, fear, anxiety—[[חֲרָדָה]] Ge 27:33 + 5 t. + Ez Eze 38:21 (rd. for [[הָרַי]], B Co cf. Dr 1Sa 14:15); cstr. [[חֶרְדַּת]] 1Sa 14:15, Pr 29:25 (v. Lag:BN 113); pl. [[חֲרָדוֹת]] Ez Eze 26:16; —

trembling, quaking (of terror ascribed to supernat. cause) 1Sa 14:15, 1Sa 14:15 (hence [[אלהים]] ´[[ח]] v. Dr; ‖[[וַתִּרְגַּז־הארץ]]) cf. Ez Eze 38:21 (v. supr.); Da 10:7; ´[[קול ח]] Je 30:5 voice of trembling; sq. gen. obj. [[אָדָם]] ´[[ח]] Pr 29:25 trembling before man; opp. pleasure Is 21:4; tremblings (pl.) Ez Eze 26:16 under fig. of garment ([[ילבשׁו]] ´[[ח]]), of effect on coast-princes of fall of Tyre.
